"Hatsukari": "You know what an Auto Interceptor: Sonner is?"
"It's a nasty DOLLS support-craft that attacks indiscriminately, firin' off beams in all directions."
"Not only that, but its main body is protected by a shield that guards against attacks from the outside."
"So, to shut these Sonners up, there's just one thing you gotta do."
"You bust up all of its \"Dazzle Pods\" that're scattered all over the place."
"If you do that, the main body's shield will lose power and deactivate."
"But, these Dazzle Pods all got some sorta cloaking device, making it a real pain to find 'em all."
"If you can, it'll be easier if you split up and search for 'em with any other ARKS in the area."
"So if you run into a Sonner, focus on takin' those out first!"
